user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping cart on the Newegg mobile website. It shows one item, the Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse, priced at $78.85. The user can adjust the quantity, save the item for later, or delete it. There is an option to add a protection plan and enter a promo code. The total cost is displayed, with a "Secure Checkout" button at the bottom.
